NAME
  start-here - very simple example for txt2man

SYNOPSIS
  start-here [-hnv] [-f configfile] file

DESCRIPTION
  start-here is used to demonstrate a very simple example of a manpage
  to be created by txt2man program.

OPTIONS
  -h             Show help message and exit.
  -n             Do anything.
  -v             Verbose mode.
  -f configfile  Use an alternative config file.

SEE ALSO
  start-here-2(1)

AUTHOR
  start-here was written by John Jr <jjr@example.com>.

  This manual page was written by Joao Eriberto Mota Filho <eriberto@debian.org>
  for the Debian project (but may be used by others).
